mainBoard.flavorText: These spirits of the air are winsome and wild, and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.
mainBoard.name: Air Elemental

foreignData.name: Kraftsog
foreignData.text: Dein Gegner muß alles Mana aus seinem verfügbaren Ländern produzieren. Dieses Mana und alles Mana, das er in seinem Manavorrat hat, fließt nun in Deinen Manavorrat.

mainBoard.name: Drain Power
mainBoard.originalText: Opponent must draw all mana from his or her available lands; this mana and all mana in opponent's mana pool drains into your mana pool. You can't take less than all your opponent's mana.

rulings.text: If a land can draw a variable amount of mana, the target player (not the player of this spell) chooses how much to draw.

This card forces the target player to draw mana from lands if they are untapped, but that player can choose how to draw the mana if a land they control has multiple mana abilities, or mana abilities with choices.
Your opponent may use instants and abilities of permanents in response to this spell before you get the mana.
A mana ability is an ability that (1) isn't a loyalty ability, (2) doesn't target, and (3) could add mana when it resolves.

mainBoard.text: Target player activates a mana ability of each land they control. Then that player loses all unspent mana and you add the mana lost this way.

mainBoard.flavorText: Earth Elementals have the eternal strength of stone and the endurance of mountains. Primordially connected to the land they inhabit, they take a long-term view of things, scorning the impetuous haste of short-lived mortal creatures.
mainBoard.name: Earth Elemental

foreignData.name: Erdbeben
foreignData.text: Das Erdbeben fügt jedem Spieler und jeder Kreatur ohne Flugfähigkeit X Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Earthquake
mainBoard.originalText: Does X damage to each player and each non-flying creature in play.

rulings.text: Whether or not a creature is without flying is only checked on resolution.

mainBoard.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

mainBoard.name: Energy Flux
mainBoard.originalText: All artifacts in play now require an upkeep cost of {2} in addition to any other upkeep costs they may have. If the upkeep cost for an artifact is not paid, the artifact must be discarded.
mainBoard.text: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {2}."

mainBoard.flavorText: Fire Elementals are ruthless infernos, annihilating and consuming their foes in a frenzied holocaust. Crackling and blazing, they sear swift, terrible paths, leaving the land charred and scorched in their wake.
mainBoard.name: Fire Elemental

foreignData.name: Feuerball
foreignData.text: Der Feuerball verursacht insgesamt X Schaden. Dieser wird gleichmäßig (abgerundet) über Zielkreaturen und/oder Spieler verteilt. Bezahle zusätzlich 1 für jedes Ziel mit Ausnahme des ersten.

mainBoard.name: Fireball
mainBoard.originalText: Fireball does X damage total, divided evenly (round down) among any number of targets. Pay 1 extra mana for each target beyond the first.

rulings.text: Fireball's damage is divided as Fireball resolves, not as it's cast, because there are no choices involved. The division involves only targets that are still legal as Fireball resolves.

For example, if X is 5 and you choose three target creatures, Fireball has a total cost of {7}{R} (even though its mana cost is just {5}{R} and its mana value is 6). If those creatures are all still legal targets as Fireball resolves, it deals 1 damage to each of them.
You can target more than X creatures. However, if the number of legal targets at the time Fireball resolves is greater than X, none of them will be dealt any damage.
You may cast Fireball with zero targets, regardless of the value chosen for X. If you do so, it will not be a targeted spell, and no damage will actually be dealt when it resolves.

mainBoard.text:
This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

mainBoard.name: Gem Bazaar
mainBoard.text:
When Gem Bazaar comes into play, choose a random color.
{T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of the color last chosen. Then choose a random color.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

foreignData.name: Blitzschlag
foreignData.text: Der Blitz fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Lightning Bolt
mainBoard.originalText: Lightning Bolt does 3 damage to one target.
mainBoard.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

foreignData.name: Manaschatz
foreignData.text:
Der Manaschatz enttappt nicht normal während Deiner Enttap-Phase. Wenn er während Deiner Versorgungsphase getappt bleibt, fügt er Dir einen Schadenspunkt zu.
{4}: Enttappe Manaschatz. Du kannst diese Fähigkeit nur während Deiner Versorgungsphase benützen.
{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um 3 farblose Mana. Behandle diese Eigenschaft wie einen Unterbrechungs-zauber.

mainBoard.name: Mana Vault
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add 3 colorless mana to your mana pool. Mana Vault doesn't untap normally during untap phase; to untap it, you must pay 4 mana during your upkeep. If Mana Vault remains tapped during upkeep it does 1 damage to you. Drawing mana from this artifact is played as an interrupt.
mainBoard.text:
This artifact doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap this artifact.
At the beginning of your draw step, if this artifact is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

mainBoard.name: Mountain
mainBoard.originalText: Tap to add {R} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Unstable Mutation
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature gains +3/+3. Each round, put a -1/-1 counter on the creature during its controller's upkeep. These counters remain even if this enchantment is removed before the creature dies.

rulings.text: The -1/-1 counters stay even if the Aura is removed, and the +3/+3 goes away when the Aura does.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: "This 'standing windstorm' can hold us off indefinitely? Ridiculous!" Saying nothing, she put a pinch of salt on the table. With a bang she clapped her hands, and the salt disappeared, blown away.
mainBoard.name: Wall of Air
mainBoard.text: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Conjured from the bowels of hell, the fiery wall forms an impassable barrier, searing the soul of any creature attempting to pass through its terrible bursts of flame.
mainBoard.name: Wall of Fire
mainBoard.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: The Earth herself lends her strength to these walls of living stone, which possess the stability of ancient mountains. These mighty bulwarks thwart ground-based troops, providing welcome relief for weary warriors who defend the land.
mainBoard.name: Wall of Stone

mainBoard.flavorText: A deafening roar arose as the fury of an enormous vertical river supplanted our serenity. Eddies turned into whirling geysers, leveling everything in their path.
mainBoard.name: Wall of Water
mainBoard.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{U}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: Unpredictable as the sea itself, Water Elementals shift without warning from tranquility to tempest. Capricious and fickle, they flow restlessly from one shape to another, expressing their moods with their physical forms.
mainBoard.name: Water Elemental

foreignData.name: Blauer Urknall
foreignData.text: Neutralisiert einen roten Zauberspruch oder zerstört eine rote Karte im Spiel.

sideBoard.name: Blue Elemental Blast
sideBoard.originalText: Counters a red spell being cast or destroys a red card in play.

rulings.text: The decision to counter a spell or destroy a permanent is a decision made on announcement before the target is selected. If the spell is redirected, this mode can't be changed, so only targets of the selected type are valid.

sideBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target red spell.
• Destroy target red permanent.

foreignData.name: Roter Urknall
foreignData.text: Neutralisiert einen blauen Zauberspruch oder zerstört eine blaue Karte im Spiel.

sideBoard.name: Red Elemental Blast
sideBoard.originalText: Counters a blue spell being cast or destroys a blue card in play.
sideBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target blue spell.
• Destroy target blue permanent.
